| Overview                = The '''Warriors of the Deadly Dagger''' are the foot soldiers representing the [[House of the Deadly Dagger]], one of the five Houses of the [[Five Weapons Society (Earth-616)|Five Weapons Society]].  As an homage to the namesake [[Deadly Warriors (Earth-616)|Deadly Warrior]], the Warriors of the Deadly Dagger are dressed in black and utilize throwing knives and daggers.  
| History                 = When [[Master Ling (Earth-616)|Master Ling]] teaches [[Shang-Chi (Earth-616)|Shang-Chi]], [[Brother Sabre (Takeshi) (Earth-616)|Brother Sabre]] and [[Sister Dagger (Esme) (Earth-616)|Sister Dagger]] to defeat [[Zheng Shi-Hua (Earth-616)|Sister Hammer]]'s [[jiangshi]] at the House of the Deadly Dagger, the Warriors of the Deadly Dagger are used as practice for the three to apply paper amulets needed to destroy jiangshi.{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 3}}  The Warriors of the Deadly Dagger later assist in defending [[London (England)|London]] from Hammer's jiangshi army.  After Shang-Chi is named the new Supreme Commander of the Society, the Warriors of the Deadly Dagger swear fealty to him.{{r|Shang-Chi Vol 1 5}}
